short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Right-to-Left Support for Atlassian products like Jira and Confluence

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add Right-to-Left support to Atlassian products like Jira and Confluence to easily read, write and modify content in Arabic, Persian or any RTL language.

Jira support includes:
- Backlog items
- Issues Navigator (Queries page)
- Issue Summary and Description
- Code snippets
- Tables
- Info panels
- Expand elements
- Bullet lists
- Numbered lists
- Link preview cards
- Linked issues
- Comments
- Mentions
